title: One of my wards is gone and I cant select it
body: Well I would really appreciate it if someone helped me with this problem my ginger bread ward is gone and I cant select it it doesn't show up I got it in a random ward chest  and know I cant find it

replies.body: I looked into this for you and can confirm the gingerbread ward has successfully unlocked on your account!  There's no eta right now, but this is actually an issue where some ward skins are not selectable even if it's unlocked on an account.  Hope that helps!
iam too my mecha ward skin gone
Thanks just wanted to know thanks for answering so quickly I will wait for the problem to be resolved
